## 7 Jan 2024
{: #network-latency-2024-01-07}

### Inter-region latency
{: #network-latency-2024-01-07-mzr}

| Average latency (ms) | Dallas | Toronto | Washington DC | Frankfurt | London | Madrid | Osaka | Sydney | Tokyo | Sao Paulo |
| --- | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: |
| **Dallas** |   | 34 | 31 | 123 | 113 | 119 | 148 | 184 | 142 | 143 |
| **Toronto** |  34 |  | 19 | 92 | 82 | 107 | 170 | 213 | 162 | 128 |
| **Washington DC** |  31 | 19 |  | 97 | 75 | 90 | 174 | 214 | 167 | 118 |
| **Frankfurt** |  123 | 93 | 96 |  | 12 | 29 | 240 | 277 | 234 | 196 |
| **London** |  113 | 82 | 75 | 12 |  | 26 | 252 | 288 | 244 | 183 |
| **Madrid** |  119 | 107 | 89 | 29 | 26 |  | 265 | 304 | 260 | 207 |
| **Osaka** |  149 | 169 | 173 | 241 | 253 | 265 |  | 123 | 9 | 292 |
| **Sydney** |  185 | 215 | 215 | 277 | 290 | 302 | 124 |  | 117 | 327 |
| **Tokyo** |  143 | 163 | 167 | 233 | 245 | 258 | 9 | 117 |  | 286 |
| **Sao Paulo** |  143 | 127 | 117 | 193 | 185 | 207 | 292 | 328 | 285 |  |
{: caption="Table 45. 9 Dec 2023–7 Jan 2024" caption-side="bottom"}
